reviews.text: Amazing corner selling ice cream. Ample space. Nice owner. Ice cream was not too sweet. French fries and Tater tots was amazing! I love it! Will come back again

A clean and modern cozy ice cream place. Savory icecream was really nice with a mix of sweetness and savory from the cream, cheese and chips. Ferrero flavor was v fragrant, hazelnut was pronounced without being overly thick.
highly recommended :)

A cozy new ice cream and waffle shop that‚Äôs quickly become a go-to dessert spot in the neighborhood!

I visited on a quiet weekend night and was warmly welcomed by the kind lady , who generously offered us samples of their flavors before we ordered.

We tried the mochi waffle topped with their premium chocolate and tiramisu ice creams‚Äîboth were absolutely delicious! ($14.50)

I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more of their waffles and ice cream.

While they aren‚Äôt halal certified as of now, they don‚Äôt use pork, lard, or alcohol in any of their products according to their signs on the front door.
